display.description: Reads and writes data from a XLS/XLSX file.
display.label: XLSX File

display.description: Reads data from a XLS/XLSX file.
display.label: Read from file

properties.description: The object property which contains a reference to the XLS/XLSX file to read from.
properties.label: File
properties.name: fileEntry

properties.description: The first row of the file contains the header names.
properties.label: Header Row
properties.name: headerRow

properties.description: When reading from file the empty cells will be filled with an empty string.
properties.label: Include Empty Cells
properties.name: includeEmptyCells

properties.description: The amount of child elements to return in a page.
properties.label: Page Size
properties.name: pageSize

properties.description: In some cases and file formats, it is necessary to read data specifically as string, otherwise some special characters are interpreted the wrong way.
properties.label: Read As String
properties.name: readAsString

properties.description: The name of the sheet to read from in the spreadsheet. If not set, the first one gets chosen.
properties.label: Sheet Name
properties.name: sheetName

display.description: Writes the data to a XLS/XLSX file.
display.label: Write to file

properties.description: The array of objects to write to the file.
properties.label: Rows
properties.name: rows

properties.description: Filename to set for binary data. By default, "file.xlsx" will be used.
properties.label: Filename
properties.name: filename

properties.description: The name of the sheet to create in the spreadsheet.
properties.label: Sheet Name
properties.name: sheetName
